enable.description: Specify whether the portal activation is enabled or not

portalKey.description: Portal Key, can be valorized by the user only in the creation. The keys can be returned on /refdata/class/portals

code.description: Unique code identifying the entity with the provider. Required if a provider is used

name.description: Translated description of the entity onto the specified language. Required if a provider is not used

type.description: Equipment type. Values: STANDARD, OPTION, DEFAULT

companySettings.description: The company's enabled settings for the company, please see /refdata/companyconfigkeys' for possible entries

enabled.description: Specify if the company is enabled or not

externalId.description: Company external ID, to be used as an external identifier for the company

moduleActivations.description: The company's enabled modules, please see /refdata/modules' for possible entries

network.description: Specify whether the company is a network company or not

parentId.description: If the company belongs to a network, specify the network company's ID

vehicleClasses.description: The company's enabled vehicle classes, please see /refdata/vehicleclasses' for possible entries

activation.description: Indicates if the Credential is active

companyIds.description: The Credential's companyIds to be associated

items.description: The Credential's companyIds to be associated

isNetwork.description: Indicates if the Credential is for a network

passwordExpired.description: Indicates if the Credential's password is expired

accountExpired.description: Indicates if the Credential is expired

accountLocked.description: Indicates if the Credential is locked

activation.description: Indicates if the Credential is active

companyIds.description: The Credential's companyIds to be associated

items.description: The Credential's companyIds to be associated

enabled.description: Indicates if the Credential is enabled

isNetwork.description: Indicates if the Credential is for a network

passwordExpired.description: Indicates if the Credential's password is expired

companyId.description: The company which the dealer belongs to

latGeo.description: The dealers's latitude specified in degrees

longGeo.description: The dealers's longitude specified in degrees

cycleType.description: wltp -> (combined, urban, extraUrban) / nedc -> (combined, low, medium, high, extraHigh)

index.description: Position of the image in the images list

main.description: True if the image is the main image, false otherwise

Image.description: Contains all the info related to one image

index.description: Position of the image in the images list

main.description: True if the image is the main image, false otherwise

ImageAttributeUpdate.description: Contains all the updatable info related to one image

id.description: Unique ID of the gallery wizard

imageShots.description: Set of ordered shots used to be followed by the wizard

ImageGalleryWizard.description: Contains the information about the gallery wizard

imageOriginalId.description: Carspark ID of the image that was replaced

ImageResponse.description: Contains all the info related to added or updated image

code.description: Unique code identifying the entity with the provider. Code is not mandatory

name.description: Translated description of the entity onto the specified language

ProviderData.description: Data which can be bound to a provider code (Infocar, JATO, etc). At least one of the fields must be populated. The lookup to bind an entity is performed in the following order: id, code, name

description.description: Translated dictionary entry onto the requested language

name.description: Unique name for the dictionary entry

RefDataElement.description: A valid dictionary possible value. Please refer to the correspective refdata endpoint to obtain the list of entries

TradeInResponse.description: Contains all the urls of the uploaded trade in files

accidentDamaged.description: Is the vehicle damaged by an accident?

co2.description: Indicates the amount of carbon dioxide emissions in grams per kilometer traveled

color.description: External color name, mandatory along with external base color

constructionDate.description: Construction date. Format ISO_8601 standard, UTC

creationDate.description: The date when the vehicle was first created. Format ISO_8601 standard, UTC

dealerId.description: The Dealer unique id for the Company

description.description: Free text description of the vehicle

enteredInStockDate.description: Entered in stock date. Format ISO_8601 standard, UTC

externalId.description: Vehicle external ID, to be used as an external identifier for the dealer

firstRegistration.description: First registration date, with format yyyyMM. Required required for vehicles with condition != NEW

gallery.description: Gallery Images - only present if requested

internalColor.description: Internal color name, mandatory along with internal base color. Also known as tapestry color

internalNote.description: Internal note, not to be published outside Carspark

lastServiceDate.description: Last service date. Format ISO_8601 standard, UTC

mileage.description: Current mileage in km. Required required for vehicles with condition != NEW

modificationDate.description: The date when the vehicle was last modified. Format ISO_8601 standard, UTC

nextGeneralInspection.description: Next vehicle's general inspection, format yyyyMM

noviceDrivable.description: Is the vehicle suitable for a novice driver?

numberPlate.description: The registered plate for the vehicle

power.description: Power of the vehicle in kW

powerHp.description: Power of the vehicle in HP

promoExpirationDate.description: Promo expiration date. Format ISO_8601 standard, UTC

reviewExpiryDay.description: Vehicle Annual technical inspection end date

reviewExpiryMonth.description: Vehicle Annual technical inspection end month

reviewExpiryYear.description: Vehicle Annual technical inspection end year

usedCarSeals.description: a List of Vehicle seals, please see /refdata/usedcarseals' for possible entries

vatRate.description: The VAT rate as percent number (a number between 0 and 100)

visibility.description: Vehicle visibility - should it be included in Stock Dashboard (true) or not (false)

VehicleDiscountDto.description: Vehicle discount - information about the discount on the vehicle
